comments.body: There is now no longer a test with `filename` with a value of `string`? Probably would be good to test both `string` and the function format?

no, there are in other blocks before and after, e.g:
https://github.com/peterblazejewicz/DefinitelyTyped/blob/update/mini-css-extract-plugin/types/mini-css-extract-plugin/mini-css-extract-plugin-tests.ts#L69
ah my bad, I thought I expanded everything in the diff view but missed that, sorry about that!
Not sure why an empty object param should be added here.

I wasn't sure if it was a valid use case in practice and if not if it was worth testing?

I don't see a problem in keeping it though if you think it's important to have tested üëç
